page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT IN MORETON
page.content: A{survey}of the parents of our class showed that 22% were employed in the service industry(fire,water,cleaning etc.), 18% in local industry, 7% in farming. 24% were professional e.g. (teachers,lecturers,nurses),shops 10%, building 7% and 12% were unemployed. An example of light{industry}in Moreton is Cotswold Casement, where they have made windows since 1888. They make windows with steel or aluminium frames, the latter being cheaper. They do not make their own glass but a firm called Solar Glass in Coventry supplies them.A Sultan had ordered 800 windows at Â£5000 each for a mansion. The staff is 1 secretary, 1 director, 1 manager, 2 window fixers and 20 factory workers. A furniture {retailing}business said they import their goods from Czechoslovakia, mostly beds and kitchen furniture.
